Entries.[65]Kara: I love it! Thank you so much!/340,400,417,724/Thank you, I liked it!/233,595/Oh, is this a gift, @?/721,720,719,718/@, what did I do to deserve this?/728,202/Get that away from me!!!/909,910,548,552,557,560/

Entries.Desk.3: This is Kara's seat. Her full name is written at the top of the Desk, Kara Linda Danva.
